system.description:
This School of magic is concerned with mastery of the air, including weather effects such as fog, clouds, thunder and lightning. Poisonous gases also fall within the remit of the School of Air. Spells from this School require strong, clear gestures to be cast, as well as words of power.

Spontaneous Casting Complexities

ComplexityEffect
0

Summon wind or fog; predict the local weather

1

Damage Health with thunder, lightning, poison gas or winds

2

Create powerful but well-controlled winds

3

Alter the temperature, wind or rain within sight range
